Longitudinal Diagnostic Classification Models

The R package tdcm provides a multilevel extension to the longitudinal diagnostic classification model (DCM) to help researchers take into account contextual effects that can impact the fidelity and effectiveness of an educational intervention. Learn more in vignette("tdcm").

Installation 

# Install development version from GitHub
devtools::install_github("cotterell/tdcm")
